notes: PRs open for #65, #66, #67, #68, #72. Issues #69, #70, #73 depend on #66/#67/#68 (PRs open, awaiting review). #71 depends on #70 (not started). After those PRs merge, implement #69 (themes), #70 (card page), #73 (gallery) in that order. Note: #67 and #68 both create src/data/language-colors.ts with identical content — second merge will be a no-op on that file. #72 OG route skips the generateMetadata update in card/[username]/page.tsx since #70 hasn't created it yet — should be added when implementing #70.
